channel.title: Spurgeon Sermons: Official Podcast
channel.description:
Prepare yourself for a transformative experience as the teachings of renowned preacher Charles Spurgeon are brought to life thanks to Premier and Spurgeon's College.
Be challenged, be equipped, and live out your faith under the guidance of one of the UK's most esteemed Bible teachers.
This podcast is introduced by Rick Warren with the sermons voiced by Paul Burbridge.
For more podcasts from Premier head to premier.plus.
Find out more about Spurgeon's College by heading to spurgeons.ac.uk
channel.itunes:author: Premier
channel.itunes:subtitle: Teachings from Charles Spurgeon
